entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 11:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -11
Wind: E 43 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to flurries overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area early this evening. Wind becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
